source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_000<tab>Ah, greetings there, friend. How fare you in your efforts to thwart the Scarlet Snout's plans? If there is aught you wish to know about my inventions, just say the word.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_000<tab>改めて何か確認したいことなどがお有りですかな？

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_010<tab>It is said that during All Saints' Wake, the saints are invited to banquets in the heavens each and every night.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_010守護天節の季節、天上では夜毎、宴が開かれて、
聖人たちが招かれると言います。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_011<tab>At such time, the world below is left unprotected, and fiends summoned by the ogre pumpkinhead are free to wreak havoc on the defenseless denizens. One fiend in particular is said to be especially boisterous...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_011そうして、聖人の加護が弱まった地上では、
「パンプキンヘッドの魔人」に導かれた魔物たちが跋扈する。
そんな「魔人の夜」で、大暴れしたと伝えられるのが……

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_012<tab>Aye, I speak of the one known as the Doomsday Clown.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_012<tab>あの赤っ鼻の男……そう、「死の道化師」なのです！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_013<tab>...Though, perhaps, you know him better as “the Scarlet Snout” or “Papa Gruff.” In any event, they are all the same most nefarious personage. If the texts are to be believed, those who set foot in his domain are fated never to return. How utterly terrifying!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_013古き書物によれば、赤っ鼻の魔人の縄張りに引き込まれると、
ヒトはタマシイを抜き取られ、帰らぬ人となってしまうのだとか。
ああ、恐ろしい……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_014<tab>This is why I fashioned my greatest creations: the fiendish lantern and the warding holy water. Inspired by what I gleaned from many an ancient tome, I have no doubt that they will serve you well in your quest to quash the Snout's nefarious plot.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_014……ですが、私が古文書を解読しつつ独自の理論で開発した道具、
「退魔のランタン」と「導魂の聖水」があれば、恐るるに足らず！
効果の程は、ぜひあなたの目でお確かめいただきたい！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_020<tab>The fiendish lantern emits a wavelength of light that voidsent absolutely detest.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_020「退魔のランタン」は、妖異が嫌う波長の光を投射し、
文字通り、魔を退けることができる優れモノ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_021<tab>Should you encounter any such fiends, pray put it to good use. I have no doubt it will serve you well.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_021妖異が現れたら「退魔のランタン」を発射してください！
奴らを退けることができるはず……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_030<tab>The warding holy water is a most miraculous liquid that enables one to rescue lost souls and return them to their mortal frames.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_030「導魂の聖水」を所持していれば、
囚われたタマシイを解放し、元の肉体へと戻すこともできるのです。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_031<tab>I have afforded you with a full phial, so please do not hesitate to use it should you come across any souls in need of succor.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_MARK_031もしも囚われたタマシイを見つけたら「導魂の聖水」を！
さすればタマシイは解放され、元の肉体へ戻るでしょう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_032<tab>The more souls you succeed in rescuing, the more pumpkin cookies you receive as a reward.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_032囚われたタマシイを解放した数に応じて、
「道化饗宴 ホーンテッドフィースト」を攻略した証として貰える、
「」の数が変化します。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_033<tab>You can exchange cookies for items and equipment by speaking with the shady smock in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_033集めた「」は、
ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂の「いかがわしい売り子」に渡すことで、
装備品やアイテムと交換できます。

source: TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_034<tab>Steel your nerves, and brave the terrors of the Scarlet Snout's demesne to save any lost souls wanting for succor.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW2021ACTIONGUIDE_00737_SYSTEM_034道中で、囚われたタマシイを見つけたら、
積極的に解放してあげましょう！
